description: Usopp fires a larger than normal explosive projectile from his Kabuto slingshot which leaves behind a trail of smoke resembling butterfly wings as it travels toward the target.
strengths: Visually impressive smoke trail for intimidation
weaknesses: Can be dodged by agile or intangible opponents

keyMoments.description: First used against Perona, though she evades it by shrinking and flying.

description: Usopp fires a large explosive projectile from his Kabuto that erupts in a distinctive green explosion upon impact. The attack is named after the praying mantis.
strengths: Green explosion can cause significant damage
weaknesses: Can be evaded by aerial or agile targets

keyMoments.description: First used against Perona, but passes through her intangible astral form.

description: Usopp fires four Kayaku Boshi (explosive pellets) at high speed with smoke trails. The four shots converge together and hit a target simultaneously, with their arcs resembling the horns of an Atlas beetle.
strengths: Effective for breaking through barriers and doors
weaknesses: Requires accurate aim to converge properly

keyMoments.description: First used to destroy the door to Perona's hidden room, successfully revealing her physical body's location.

description: Perona creates miniature ghosts the size of her palm using her Horo Horo no Mi powers. These small ghosts can be sent to swarm opponents and are used in conjunction with her Ghost Rap technique to create explosions.
strengths: Multiple ghosts can be created simultaneously
Small size makes them difficult to track
Can be detonated on command for explosive damage
weaknesses: Require Ghost Rap to deal damage
Physical attacks pass through them before detonation

keyMoments.description: First used against Usopp, summoning numerous Mini Hollows to swarm him.

description: After sending her Mini Hollows toward an opponent, Perona snaps her fingers to make them explode with devastating force. A single explosion is strong enough to create holes in stone walls.
strengths: Can destroy stone and other solid materials
Works in conjunction with Mini Hollows for area damage
weaknesses: Requires Mini Hollows to be created first
Opponent may escape range before detonation

keyMoments.description: First used against Usopp, detonating Mini Hollows to bombard him with explosions that create holes in walls.

description: Luffy stretches his fingers and spreads them apart to create a net-like formation. This technique is used defensively to catch or counter enemy attacks, similar to Gomu Gomu no Shield but designed to capture rather than deflect.
strengths: Effective against swarm or projectile attacks
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cutting attacks between fingers
May not work against extremely powerful attacks

keyMoments.description: First used to counter Moria's Brick Bat swarm, catching the shadow bats and smashing them to the ground.
